Title: SEO Tools
Description: This is a website containing some commonly used SEO tools. I have only added a blog ping utility at this time but there is more to come.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a website containing some commonly used SEO tools. I have only added a blog ping utility at this time but there is more to come.

Jeremy's SEO Tools

This is a collection of SEO tools for use on an ASP.Net website. Feel to free to add these to your own website or build a site from this solution.

We currently have

- Blog Pinger - Pings multiple blog update sites when you've updated your blog
- Server Header Checker - check server headers to ensure accuracy for crawling

Future plans:

- Code to text ratio tool
- html compressor
- image optimizer
- keyword analyzer
- backlink checker

This project is open to any suggestions or contributions.

You can view the current version of this site here: Jeremy's SEO Tools on Iron Foundry.

These tools are created by Jeremy Morgan as a suite of tools for my blog.

I hope to be adding more soon
